segment.source: Evaluating Spinlock Data
segment.target: Evaluating Spinlock Data

segment.source: Evaluating Spinlock Data
segment.target: Evaluating Spinlock Data

segment.source: Evaluating Spinlock Data
segment.target: Evaluating Spinlock Data

segment.source: The spinlock report presents the following information about spinlocks:
segment.target: The spinlock report presents the following information about spinlocks:

segment.source: Acquire sample rate.
segment.target: Acquire sample rate.

segment.source: Contention sample rate.
segment.target: Contention sample rate.

segment.source: Spin threshold.
segment.target: Spin threshold.

segment.source: Number of CPUs.
segment.target: Number of CPUs.

segment.source: CPU speed, in megahertz.
segment.target: CPU speed, in megahertz.

segment.source: Trace length, in nanoseconds.
segment.target: Trace length, in nanoseconds.

segment.source: Trace length, in cycles.
segment.target: Trace length, in cycles.

segment.source: The next sections of the report show the spinlock usage during the profile time period.
segment.target: The next sections of the report show the spinlock usage during the profile time period.

segment.source: Each spin lock is shown separately.
segment.target: Each spin lock is shown separately.

segment.source: Spin locks are sorted with the "hottest" spin locks shown first.
segment.target: Spin locks are sorted with the "hottest" spin locks shown first.

segment.source: Often it is possible to identify the spinlock bottleneck by looking at the top few spin locks.
segment.target: Often it is possible to identify the spinlock bottleneck by looking at the top few spin locks.

segment.source: The following information is presented for each spin lock:
segment.target: The following information is presented for each spin lock:

segment.source: Type of lock.
segment.target: Type of lock.

segment.source: Kernel address of lock.
segment.target: Kernel address of lock.

segment.source: Symbol of the lock.
segment.target: Symbol of the lock.

segment.source: Spinlocks created dynamically do not have symbols.
segment.target: Spinlocks created dynamically do not have symbols.

segment.source: A summary report follows with the follow information:
segment.target: A summary report follows with the follow information:

segment.source: Percentage of CPU time spent on lock acquisition.
segment.target: Percentage of CPU time spent on lock acquisition.

segment.source: Percentage of CPU time spent on lock contention.
segment.target: Percentage of CPU time spent on lock contention.

segment.source: Lock acquisition rate.
segment.target: Lock acquisition rate.

segment.source: Collision rate.
segment.target: Collision rate.

segment.source: Spin rate.
segment.target: Spin rate.

segment.source: Contention rate, both sampled and normalized.
segment.target: Contention rate, both sampled and normalized.

segment.source: The final two sections of the report are the events skipped due to interrupts and the release function.
segment.target: The final two sections of the report are the events skipped due to interrupts and the release function.

segment.source: Interrupts can occur while spin locks are held.
segment.target: Interrupts can occur while spin locks are held.

segment.source: When this occurs, the interrupt handling time is included in the spinlock holding time, and the spinlock holding time appears inordinately long.
segment.target: When this occurs, the interrupt handling time is included in the spinlock holding time, and the spinlock holding time appears inordinately long.

segment.source: Xperf does not include spinlock events that are held while an interrupt is handled when calculating spinlock holding times.
segment.target: Xperf does not include spinlock events that are held while an interrupt is handled when calculating spinlock holding times.

segment.source: The “Events skipped due to interrupts” line displays the number of events that were not included in the calculation.
segment.target: The “Events skipped due to interrupts” line displays the number of events that were not included in the calculation.

segment.source: This number is normally very small.
segment.target: This number is normally very small.

segment.source: A spin lock can be acquired or released from different code paths.
segment.target: A spin lock can be acquired or released from different code paths.

segment.source: A list of release functions of the spin lock is displayed at the end of the report.
segment.target: A list of release functions of the spin lock is displayed at the end of the report.

segment.source: The list is sorted by spinlock holding time.
segment.target: The list is sorted by spinlock holding time.

segment.source: Additional information about a particular release function, such as acquisition or contention, is also presented.
segment.target: Additional information about a particular release function, such as acquisition or contention, is also presented.

segment.source: Example
segment.target: Example

segment.source: The following example shows how to obtain a summary of spinlock data.
segment.target: The following example shows how to obtain a summary of spinlock data.

segment.source: The following example shows how to limit the number of records returned to the five most active spin locks.
segment.target: The following example shows how to limit the number of records returned to the five most active spin locks.

segment.target: Related topics
